website_summaries.verdict: Between its large capacity and relatively small footprint in the fridge, this model makes it easy to enjoy a lot of cold and crisp filtered water between refills.
pros: Removes common pesticides, industrial pollutants, and heavy metals from water
Slim and tall profile conserves fridge space
cons: Filters more slowly than you may expect

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY WHAT THEY CLAIM IS A LIE
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Now I'm stuck with this dispenser and 4 additional filters that are useless because Amazon is telling me they are nonreturnabke. I give them ZERO stars. Pictures are worth a thousand words. The 265 reading was direct from faucet, the 254 was through the filter. That's only 11 points difference. NOT acceptable. This product claims to be 2X better than Brita so consumer beware. I get a much lower reading from bottled spring and filteted water so I'm back to buying bottled water. I feel truly scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working great over a year now
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this in my refrigerator for over a year now. We use it daily and refill it at least twice per week. Zero issues with leaking and it filters out any issues we had with the heavily chlorinated city water. Very happy with this especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Filters really slowly
customer_reviews.text: I like having this filter because it helps me cut back on my plastic usage but it filters really slowly which is kind of a downer if you drink a lot of water. It’s like this thing will never be full! I can fill the top part all the way up after work, leave it in the fridge, then wake up the next day and the top half is not entirely empty. The water tastes clean and refreshing though, plus it’s better for the environment than buying cases of water so it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Best water filter!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried Brita and PUR but definitely PUR is the best. The material is durable, easy to change filter and light in weight.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water container and filter system. My little girls can open the fridge and "pour" water if they want. Also, the water tastes great. I sometimes refill my Evian water bottle and can't tell the difference in taste. That was not the case before. Also, keeps water cold for the entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Sara75

customer_reviews.title: It works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this water dispenser for some months now and at first we thought you’re supposed to fill the water back up when it’s half-way dispensed to top it up... We successfully ruined two long lasting filters! Apparently, the filter gets clogged fast if you do not let ALL the water to filter down to the bottom and use that water up first before filling it up again. Stagnant water in the filter area top is bad because it clogs the filter in few weeks! So we changed things up and we’re still using the same filter for over 2 months and it hasn’t slowed down yet. It works well and we recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Works well, until it doesn't....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water filter in Sept 2017. It worked really well for about a year. All of a sudden the filters just stopped working. It would take almost 48 hours for the water to completely filter through to the bottom of the container. We tried using different filters, taking the filters out and shaking them, etc... nothing worked. Maybe it was a really bad batch of filters, but it's disappointing because they are expensive. Just replaced this with the Brita Max 18cup filter and it's amazing how different they are. The Brita completely filters in about 10-15 minutes, not 2 days. Would definitely not recommend the PUR filter unless you want to deal with constant frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Powers

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked fine for about 3 weeks and now all of the sudden it’s not filtering water hardly at all. It never fills the tank past half way even if there is water on top and when it does filter it is like an ounce every 10 minutes. I can’t imagine the filter already needs to be changed after three weeks. I haven’t decided if I’m going to return it yet or just deal with it being crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Perez

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the other brand(s)
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Brita and wanted to filter out more from my water than the Brita can offer so after some research I turned to Pur brand. This product not only filters out way more from your water but I love the ease of using and cleaning the dispenser. The spout comes out nice and fast (easy to fill tea pot or pan of water) and the top reservoir holds extra in it that will come down when more space is available so you are not always constantly filling. Beware of knock off filters if you are trying to filter out everything Pur does.
customer_reviews.author: PILRBNQ

customer_reviews.title: Clean it up every day
customer_reviews.text: It will be okay if you use it just for a month or so it is plastic in will get lots of humidity in bacteria fungus accumulation with the time
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: These filters work for 2-3 gallons and clog up. We have reached out to PUR directly with promise of assistance but then no follow through. Like their product, their customer service is severely lacking. Love the size. It fits nicely in the refrigerator and capacity is great for a larger family. However, very frustrating a company can't design, test and QC such a simple product. Save your money and frustration and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: jhobbs

customer_reviews.title: Filters constantly clog
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. The filters continually clog. When I first got this dispenser I followed all the instructions. However when I tried to fill the container, the water would not filter. The filter was jammed. I went through the recommended declogging steps twice to no avail. I contacted customer service and they sent me a new one. At first this one seemed to be working ok. Ive been using it about a month and the filter continually clogs. I'm always cleaning a clog. It is very annoying. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Filter clogs
customer_reviews.text: The design and usefulness of the container is excellent. However, for each refilling, I have to remove filter and follow directions to shake it and rinse to eliminate clogs. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ng161

customer_reviews.title: Works great only for a week
customer_reviews.text: The first week was awesome. The water tasted good too. Loved it and even got another one for mom as a gift. Disappointment wasn't far. The filter just stopped working in 2nd week and would filter just a few drops of water. Tried various options to clear the filter but didn't work. Don't see a point in using a new replacement filter every week. The product doesn't live up to the promise.
customer_reviews.author: Aye Kay

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a few of these from different brands and I got to say out of all the brands I've tried this is the worst one. The tank doesn't hold a lot and it comes with one filter. The filter gets clogged constantly! And to unclog it you have to take it apart and dump all your water. When it does work it's VERY slow drip! It can take a couple hours! Even the replacement filters I bought are the same way. Very poor quality! I will never buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge container
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes great! No clue why water tastes horrible through my refridgerator filter. Its one of those very expensive models and it just tasted off. Had a real bad aftertaste and softish feel. Got the PUR filter and now I run Fridge water into the 18 cup reservoir and it tastes soooo much better! PUR filters are easy to install and this 18 cup tanks is super easy to remove and clean. You can access everything easy with a big brush. Seems fairly sturdy, but I would be careful moving it when filled with water. Water is heavy and if it sloshes around violently you run a higher risk if cracking plastic. Totally worth the value and results.
customer_reviews.author: Zoucrew

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal, excellent size
customer_reviews.text: So I was getting tired of buying water bottles and finally decided to get one of these this is a very good size it slides into the refrigerator perfectly it does come with a filter but beyond that the deal that's going on is that you get another for filters for 25 bucks for this size you seriously can't beat that now the filters shipped separately but there is one that comes with the container so you can set it up right away very easy setup holds a lot of water seems to be working great fantastic deal
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shirav

customer_reviews.title: 4.7 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and like any other traditional water filter pitcher or holder device. Two things you need to consider though. First, if you are keeping this in the fridge the device might be deeper than your fridge can handle. I had to move door shelves to get it to fit inside. Then second, it filters very slow. So don’t expect to fill it and then use it right away like a brita pitcher. This does filter more things (according to the box) so it makes since it’s slower. I have found that shaking the filter prior to use helps considerably (this is suggested in the directions)
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Water wont drain inside after a month
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to give this 1 star for now. Water will not filter into the bottom of the pitcher. I replaced the filter and its fine now. But the one that came with this pitcher only lasted 1 month! I had a Brita pitcher that never had this issue. I am contacting support but if I dont hear back I'll have to leave this at 1 star. Total bummer!
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: A very well made.....
customer_reviews.text: ....filter dispenser. It holds a good amount of water, pur makes very good filters. I have this sitting on one side of my top fridge shelf. It's easy to pour a glass of water. I like that it doesn't drip when I turn it off. Many spouts like this will drip a few drops after turning it off. This seems, so far, as very nice quality. I'm quite pleased with my purchase. It looks easy enough to clean except where the spout is, but that's the nature of the beast, no matter who you buy from. the spout has to be way down low, or you wouldn't get the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Filter not working as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Even after several reloads and vigorous shaking, doesn't let more than half the water into the lower tank. So overall, Not good product. Haven't had this problem when purchasing the identical product at Target. Something is up with the product Amazon is selling. 3/08/2020: After seeing other reviewers with same issue, I have adopted their research. Apparently PUR has put out this NEW product to replace the original product. My review stands. This NEW product seems to be causing all the problems ... and it seems everybody is having the same issues as I had. But the issues seem to be solely on PUR and not Amazon. -
customer_reviews.author: Paramasivam Thiyagarajan

customer_reviews.title: PUR 18 Cup Dispenser, Includes 1 Filter, Filter...  PUR
customer_reviews.text: This is my second. I moved and gave the first away. Good filter makes good tasting water. Don't be impatient. If the water slides through like eggs thru a hen the filter may be bad. If it takes a faily long time to filter the water, it is doing its job. I may order again for my beer making.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Will not be going back to brita!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after our Brita filter broke because it wasn’t dispensing any water after a couple of months. I have to say, I love this filter better than the brita one! It dispenses with such force it only takes a few seconds to fill up a water bottle. It looks nice and it fits easily in a corner next to my sink unlike the brita one! I will not be going back to brita after trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rinkal Patel

customer_reviews.title: This product's filters are defective
customer_reviews.text: I have had this products for ~4 years too long due to lack of other comparable options on the market. Finally, there are more options and I can get rid of this one. The product claims that it's filters should last 2 months. I get about a month out of the filter before it completely stops working. Note that it starts slowing a week or 2 before that. It's amazing to me how they are still selling the filters when people have been complaining about these for YEARS! What a rip-off!!
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product. The filter stops filtering every other day. It’s the problem of dispenser not of filter as the filter works well in PUR pitcher, it’s in this one that it always gets clogged or something. I bought this to have more volume of filtered water but no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best water container I have ever used. It fits perfectly on fridge shelf. The size makes for fewer refills-a plus! Also, easy to refill & clean. And the taste of the water is as if you just got it from a spring. Our household has definitely increased its water consumption simply because of its convenience.
customer_reviews.author: susan moors

customer_reviews.title: Slow filter... Tastes ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in a bundle deal. Product is not so great. Filter tap is too hard and not flexible. Hard to clean. It takes 20 to 30 minutes to filter completely. Tastes ok. I think it is better than Brita water filter. Next time I would go for RO filter.
customer_reviews.author: Sukumar Bezawada

customer_reviews.title: Filters work about 25% of the time...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had multiple filters (Pur brand) not work. Followed directions to -unclog- filter, but it’s annoying how often it’s clogged when it’s brand new and how often you have to do it and how often -unclogging- it doesn’t work anyway. Most annoying water filter I’ve used ...
customer_reviews.author: Emmonite

customer_reviews.title: Thank. The. Lord!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dispenser for my classroom because our city water started to have an awful taste (our water comes from a lake and apparently there's a new "harmless" yet disgusting algea). None of my students would drink water throughout the day, which wasn't good since its summer and we live in the south. This filter took ALL of the nasty taste out of the water!! It was a lifesaver and a dern miracle! I have now have no problem getting my students to drink water! Thank you, Pur!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin G.

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the larger size a lot but it does take some time to filter through all 18 cups of water when filled to the brim. The one we ordered also happened to leak for a few weeks so we had to keep a small bowl underneath to prevent spillage into the rest of the fridge--so be wary of that!! Also wish this had a sensor to let you know when to change the filter too but I fixed that just putting on a label on it for every 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: JKMc

customer_reviews.title: Favorite water filter
customer_reviews.text: I've used this water filter for 20+ years and it is always my go-to. The taste of the water is great, and it filters more chemicals than Brita does. Although the filter replacements are more expensive than Brita, I would still choose Pur because the purpose of a water filter is to filter out the harmful chemicals, which Pur does a better job with. They also give a coupon in every water filter replacement so you can save money on the next replacement you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eva H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fit in fridge. Very cold clean water.
customer_reviews.text: I love having clean cold water with just a flip of the flip dispenser. My family refills the lightweight container 1-2 times a day. The water tastes great! Feels good knowing my family is drinking something that is good for them. I also have Rainsoft Reverse Osmosis system with my homes water softener. The Pur Water Filtration system certainly compliments the R.O. system when its water supply gets diminished from multiple everyday uses. SUPER HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: D.  Thoel

customer_reviews.title: Water stays at the top and filters slowly
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this filter for 6 months now and have purchased two new filters because I make sure to change them every two months. Well as of recently it seems that the water pools at the top and filters only a little bit so I constantly have to tip the pitcher to get some water or refill it even though there is a lot left on top that has not come down. Not sure why this is happening but it is becoming pretty frustrating and I'm thinking of just buying a water cooler or new filter at this point.
customer_reviews.author: H Noel

customer_reviews.title: I’m drinking deliciously clean water AND saving money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a water dispenser that was built into my fridge, it broke so I bought this in hopes to get me through till I could buy a new fridge.... after using now for a couple months and reviewing the costs, I no longer want a fridge with the water dispenser..... couple extra hundred dollars for the fridge itself with the water dispenser, then $60 a filter OR this one time purchase of the 18 cup dispenser and then you can find 6-8 refills for $25-30..... it’s a no brainer!! And the water is clean and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! (And I'm Picky!)
customer_reviews.text: I hate getting up from bed to get a glass of water to stay hydrated through the night. This is slim enough to sit on my nightstand, and the spigot is perfect for easy access, and I have found it to be drip-free so far! The large capacity means I only have to refill it every other day or so, and when I do refill it, the extra-large pre-filter capacity means I can dump in a pitcher of water and let it filter at its own pace, without having to refill and refill as it flown through.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Couch

customer_reviews.title: It pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: This device pays for itself in very short order. If you think about how much it costs to buy a single bottle of water, and then you multiply it by how many bottles you drink in any two weeks...... Then you will have recouped your cost. We have had to change filters on this quite frequently, but that is probably a function of the quality of water around here and not of the filter itself. For people who are environmental, this is also very good because it saves a large number of plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Leib Gershon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for a big family.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this water filter/dispenser now for three years. We live in a sweltering area (up to 50-degree Celcius), and I left it empty for over a month during the summer while we were on vacation. When we came home, I tried to fill it but noticed a crack on the filter tray. I immediately reordered it because we can't live without it anymore. It filters the water nicely and is very easy for kids and grownups to use.
customer_reviews.author: katharina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Great pitcher, I use a lot of filtered water (drinking. Making coffee) this let's me keep a large amount in my fridge. I usually boil the water first, cool it down a bit in the fridge in a different pitcher then once cooled filter it. But reliable pitcher and super easy to use and clean. The filters for me work better than brita filters, much cleaner tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: Sick bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good Dispenser/Purifier
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I hate the idea of single use plastic bottles. It works great and I've had it a long time. Filters are easy to replace and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: The Bull

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 3 weeks and we dont understand why
customer_reviews.text: this is not a good product do not trust and since amazon has made it I am returning it for a different company... the water tastes now as though no filtration is being used it is supposed to last at least 3 months.. didn't even last 4 weeks.... dishonorable people selling defective items
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Really like this water system!
customer_reviews.text: This filtering system works well. The filters are supposed to last a couple months, but I drink a lot of water so I change them more frequently. System fits perfectly in the fridge. My only complaint is that it takes a bit of time to fill. You have to fill the top portion, let it filter (which takes about 10 minutes), then fill it again (so you have a completely full container). It’s easy to maintain as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Throwaway
customer_reviews.text: I do not give this product five starts only because there are no parts. Throwaway mentality, but it works great. Remember, with these filter devices, they only estimate when the filters go bad based on an average family consumption and time. Only a lab test would know for sure. As a plumber, I pulled filters out of purification systems that were GREEN with algae.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this in my refrigerator for over a year now. We use it daily and refill it at least twice per week. Zero issues with leaking and it filters out any issues we had with the heavily chlorinated city water. Very happy with this especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaahnavi

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD WATER CONTAINER
customer_reviews.text: We love this container. This size is perfect for our refrigerator. It's easy to get in and out of the refrigerator to fill. It's easy to clean and when it's full it lasts at least a week and we drink a lot of water. We like the narrow shape so it doesn't take up a lot of room in the frig. We'd order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher. Don't like the pour lever.
customer_reviews.text: Quite tall and I had to adjust my fridge shelves to make it fit. Would prefer a different design. Pour lever feels cheap and is quite rigid in its operation compared to my friends Brita. Otherwise this is a great pitcher and I have always liked the Pur brand.
customer_reviews.author: Green A

customer_reviews.title: Slowest draining unit & filters ever.
customer_reviews.text: Size is great, look is great. BUT, the filters are terrible and don’t drain into the base. It takes hours to filter which makes using it ridiculous. No matter how many (no off brands were used!) filters we’ve purchased and tried, they all have this problem after one or two fill-ups. Their packaging/materials also state that slow draining could be a problem while giving trouble-shooting tips. Unfortunately, none of the tips work. I say good luck and hope you’re patient for a drink to anyone who gets this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Dara W Faust

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Have One
customer_reviews.text: I like this dispenser very much and have recommended it to a friend as well. It's great for cold water if don't have an ice cube dispenser in your fridge. The filters are rather expensive but one filter lasts quite awhile depended on how much water you use of course. It doesn't take up a lot of space in the fridge unless you have an especially small one. I've had one for quite awhile and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTING WATER !!  JUST GET IT
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! Such a deal too! Water really tastes wonderful. Its hard to believe this didn't cost $50-$60+ which was the case at you know that place we all hate to go to but do and would never admit it. $20!!!!!Best $ ever spent. Its a little slow at 1st but hey you are filtering out who knows what out of the water and the resulting taste speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA SAWREY

customer_reviews.title: falling quality of Pur
customer_reviews.text: Pur quality has been degrading in the past few years. 7 years ago I bough pur and cotinued to use it for its true crisp taste. But obviously the product quality is getting worse, mainly due to the filters. Today I got the new product and cannot wait to use it. But the soaking filter release tons of carbon particles. There seems a particle release linearly growing with the manufacture year of pur filter. This is ruining pur figure in my mind. Hope the filtered water is still OK.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased 2.
customer_reviews.text: I keep one in fridge, and the other on the counter, for coffee. What a difference in flavor. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my second water dispenser, I like it a lot. The filter last longer than 2 months, we actually used it for almost 6, but we had to filter the water twice after a while, because the taste was not good as the beginning. When the filter gets older than 2 months, water will be filtered slower. Be sure to clean the filter quickly under running water before filtering new water. Very good product. I just wish it would be possible to automatically make the water come down without holding the white handler. Be careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So nice we bought one for our neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Last year I received this product for Christmas, and it's treated us so well that we decided to buy one for our neighbors, who drink bottled water instead of tap water. We felt their habits weren't eco-friendly, so we bought this item for Christmas for them and now they're loving it! It's easy to move, easy to refill, and it's easy to install new filters when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Use all water then refill, great buy, holds a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in fridge, holds a lot of water. Apparently have to fill water then use the clean water until empty, then refill or filters get clogged. Good tasting, use for cooking, drinking and for pups. Got extra filters. Hope when water runs out in stores can use also.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few of these. It is the only one I would buy. It is easy to use. Fill, let it filter thought, out in you fridge, and use the spout to get clean, cold water. It holds a couple gallons, so depending how much you drink, it could last a little bit. I actually have two in my fridge. I go though a lot. It is a great product for clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Mick, as in Jagger...

customer_reviews.title: hello
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am writing to you because no flow spigot came in my order PUR Basic Filter Classic - Dispenser of 18 cups, With basic filter., lately I have problems with my orders flow controlled spigot att genoveva
customer_reviews.author: genoveva

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy and thirsty
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for less than a month and have only been using it for approximately 2 weeks and already the water isn’t filtering through and it just staying in the top. Very unhappy with the filter that comes with. Ordered replacements. Hopefully it is just the filter and not the actual container.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to buy plastic water jugs/bottles
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to use and clean. It takes a little while to filter but it's not that big of a deal. The taste is also pretty good. Nice not having to buy water bottles and gallon jugs anymore. I'm saving a ton already. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ons Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Love this water purifier
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this purifier/cooler. Keep it in the fridge, and it pours quickly with a wide mouth spout. The wife uses the heck out of it. Buy filters for it comes with one but you can buy them in packs of three and each one lasts a couple two or three months.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water dispenser way better than the handle dispenser. So much easier to fill and refill my bottles for day trips! I definitely recommend.. buying another for my office!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben A Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Water does not drip to the bottom compartment completely.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the apocalypse, I'd return it if I could. The water filter seems to be clogged after a few weeks of use. Water drips through filter super slow, even over night the top compartment is half full. Therefore I haven't been able to stay hydrated as I would like. I would recommend purchasing a different brand. Sorry for the bad review. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tastes like plastic chemicals
customer_reviews.text: no matter how many times i've cleaned and changed filters, according to the directions, my water tastes like plastic when it goes through this filter/and chamber. from the tap it's fine. super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kittymagik

customer_reviews.title: Happy as a hippo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 18-cup with basic filter for use at home, since bottles of water are becoming hard to find at grocery stores. I can no longer smell the chlorine in my tap water and it tastes amazing. The container fits well in my refrigerator and the spout makes it easy to use. Luckily, the shelf in my refrigerator glides forward, so it is easy to refill. I am hoping the replacement filters I ordered will work...it was hard to figure out what model number is compatible with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had no trouble with the slow flow noted by a number of other reviewers.
customer_reviews.text: This filter tank is well made, and its form factor makes it a good fit for my refrigerator. It is easy to handle for refilling, and after following the manufacturer's instructions with the filter, I had no trouble with slow flow of water through the filter into the lower portion of the tank such as a number of other purchasers have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Paul Winter

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure they do product studies on size of these items. maybe they want to make sure everyone can fit it under their sink faucet, but i feel with a little more width and height there would be a lot of trips saved from refilling. also the spout works but feels flimsy and takes a little time to fill a glass. gives impression that it might give one day. but product has worked well giving lots of fresh water so i'm pretty happy with this unit.

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t do it. Find another product
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I bought 4-5 filters and would follow the instructions for use - it would filter fine for a few days (slow). Then the water would get stuck & would take hours to fill up. I spent days frustrated trying to drink water and dealing with the filter trying to get the water to pass through. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Alvarenga

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Water
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit because it doesn't take up a lot of room in the fridge. It is long, but narrow, so it is a good space-saver, and the water is clear and tasty. The Pur filters do a great job of purifying the town well water that I had.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Easy and Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Say good bye to plastic! With the panic buyers of Covid I knew my family shouldn’t rely on plastic water bottles. We put our regular tap in (yucky taste for sure), and get nice clean (yummy) water out! We keep it on our counter top but it’s the perfect size for the fridge. The filter work fairly quickly and the spout is a quick pour. Very little wait for a full filtered container. Keeps us happy and hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I purchased dripped constantly which ended up ruining all the fruits and vegetables in our refrigerator drawers. The water also doesn't fully empty into the reservoir on the bottom via the filter. A majority of what you fill it with just sits in the top tank which we've noticed has resulted in some sort of mold forming. I may have received a defective unit but from reading the other reviews, it looks like this is a pretty consistent theme. I would recommend going another direction for water filtration.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Ok refills hard to find and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use. Going d refills hard to locate in stores having to buy online. Found myself constantly refilling and ordering filters too often. Water had no bad taste or odor. Eventually gave away and went back to buying bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend to everyone. Make sure to change the filter regularly as per instructions. Do not drink water from an overused filter. Read up! Stay healthy and environmentally conscious with your own filtered water instead of single use bottled water. Has been problem free since purchase for 2 years now. Still like new.
customer_reviews.author: beef cake

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This water purifier has been amazing. It's been a daily struggle getting my 2 year old to drink water without it having some sort of juice mixed in now she's drinking full sippy cups of water and is only drinking juice occasionally. I like that it just slides into the fridge and that you can use it without taking it out every time like a regular pitcher. Fills pretty easily just take it out and it fits at an angle in the sink it's pretty light even when full. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Water flavor is good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of water is good. It's not easy to clean as if some dust particle gets inside, it's hard to take it out. The filter takes some time after you add water to be ready to use. But it's ok as the time is not too much.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It worked good before. After not long it stop filter and it keep stopping even after fix it
customer_reviews.author: Jie

customer_reviews.title: Needs a redesign
customer_reviews.text: not sure why the unit has curved sides. Really wastes room in the fridge. It could be much smaller and still have the same volume. The top storage tank section also needs to be smaller compare to the bottom purified section.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Can't clean in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I think everything should be dishwasher safe these days. This is not. I am using this to purify water for my humidifiers. It has been worthwhile in terms of price savings, but it's not as good as just distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: too tall for refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: this product was too tall and didn't fit in the refrigerator so had to return it. otherwise it seems like a good product. would be great if it was more of a square shape instead of a tall rectangle.
customer_reviews.author: san francisco

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. The filter clogs after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money and read the other pur reviews, sorted by date. Recent pur filters clog after a handful of uses. Even several hours after filling, no water actually goes through the filter. I remember when pur had a superior product to Brita but apparently those days are long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Good Water
customer_reviews.text: We keep the PUR DS in the fridge for cold water. We do not truly know how this system works against tap water because our tap water is SO chlorinated that we actually boil the water before filling the container up. (Common sense note: Allow the water to cool before you fill up the filter!)
customer_reviews.author: a. sierra

customer_reviews.title: Works as tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and even tastes better when this is combined with the faucet purifier. It fits great in my fridge and I like that it has the spout so it's easy to pour the cold water
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this size! I've had no issues. I'm a huge water snob and the water that this filters tastes really good and just clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher worked great in the beginning but after week 3 its stopped filtering. I read a few reviews that had the same issue. I will try some of the suggestions but i dont feel that i should have to bang or rig the filter for it to work properly. Im not totally happy
customer_reviews.author: ttrini

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great taste but cost is now just to high
customer_reviews.text: I buy almost everything from Amazon. This is one of my better purchases. 1 month ago the cost was approximately $25.00. It's now $72.00. Amazon Really got to do better!
customer_reviews.author: Ern D.

customer_reviews.title: Wont drain
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product....bought two different times and both stop draining after 2 or 3 refills. Don't waste your time. Spend a little bit more and go with the Brita
customer_reviews.author: Russell Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love this filter. The shape is a bit awkward, but it also kind of works perfectly since it's slim and slides on the corner of my refridgerator very nicely. It keeps my water tasting delicious, crisp, refreshing, and clean ALWAYS. I live in an area where I can drink water right from my sink, actually, but still use a filter and am glad I chose this one. It's very effective and is a great price for the quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: jflar

customer_reviews.title: It's big!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially considered returning it because the refrigerator door wouldn't close. The tap protrudes just enough that I had to rearrange a few shelves, but now it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a deal but this was the worse investment I have ever made.. will fill the top reservoir and I will only get two cups of water at the bottom for use. I do not recommend this purchase at all
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Lance

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, it's easy to put together and clean. The filters aren't too crazy expensive, and it works well. I compared reviews for a few different brands and I'm glad I went with this one
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fink

customer_reviews.title: Tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine came with an expired filter, but it tastes exactly like tap water. There is no difference if I drink the tap compared to this. Also it seriously took 4 hours for it to filter a few cups. I wish I could return it but I threw the box away already. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! BUY A BRITTA INSTEAD.
customer_reviews.author: Tisa sorque

customer_reviews.title: SLIM DESIGN WINS
customer_reviews.text: Home w/ 3 adults - you will refill daily be warned. Slim design makes perfect fit for fridge. I really like this dispenser design over pour pitcher. Great for filling water bottles and cups. Smart design.
customer_reviews.author: Khansa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Water much better now.
customer_reviews.text: Would not drink our water before. Now we do. Flavor much better.. replacement filters are expensive. But still cheaper than going to water machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Vredenburg

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: Mostly love it but there are a few things I’d change... I wish the top would seal better so you don’t splash water when putting it back in the fridge. It drains very slowly. But water tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: a little too tall for fridge
customer_reviews.text: smells from plastic for about the first month. The only way I could fit it on the fridge shelf was without the cover. Then slide on the cover once the base & top are placed on the shelf. If your shelves are adjustable you shouldn't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good for fridges without water dispensers!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful for fridges that don’t have water dispensers! It holds 4 gallons of water so you don’t have to refill it as often as a smaller water pitcher. The filters last 2-3 months (on paper) but I’ve left it in up to 4 months and the water tastes just the same and as fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Water tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought. We liked our first one so well, that our daughter wanted to get one for her home. Easy to use, works great. Water tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. It didn’t let me store a lot of water and it leaked some sort of blackish blue dye on the top. I found it annoying to refil every couple of days. Just get a filter that will hook up to your sink or something and save your time! I drank less water with this product!
customer_reviews.author: MA890

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fridge filter kept clogging up, so I decided to purchase this little device. It is probably one of the best purchases I have made. The flavor is good, plus you know you are getting good quality water. Would recommend 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is great, we had the smaller pitcher version but had to fill it alot, this is huge and fits in the fridge great. But is a bit awkward to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from the smaller one i had
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy if you have the space. Very easy to fill up and easy to clean. And fits perfectly in my fridge so i can fill a cup up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Rell Richardson

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't filter water. The water just sits in the reservoir.
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. If you fill it up about 2 weeks before you want cold water, you might get a glass out of it. It just sits in the top, never filtering. I did appreciate how they included a specially printed warning thrown outside the product box stating "if the water doesn't drain, just shake the filter!". If you're aware of a defect in your product, don't continue selling it without fixing it. Shaking the filter does nothing. Should've just stuck with Brita initially.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This size is good. We are a family of 3 and refill this about 2x's a day, sometimes 3. I do wish they made an even bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

product_meta.title: PUR DS1800Z 18-Cup Dispenser with Basic Filter
product_meta.description: Material Type:PlasticPUR 18 Cup Displenser w/ One Filter.
feature_bullets: Pur Classic Water Filtration Dispenser: PUR’s 18-Cup Water Dispenser Fits in Your Fridge for Easy, Quick Access to Cleaner Drinking Water.

PITCHER WATER FILTERS: PUR Basic Pitcher filters provide 40 gallons of filtered water, or 1-2 months of typical use, before you need a replacement. Only PUR pitcher filters are certified to reduce contaminants in PUR pitcher filter systems

WHY FILTER WATER? Home tap water may look clean, but may contain potentially harmful pollutants & contaminants picked up on its journey through old pipes. PUR water filters, faucet filtration systems & water filter pitchers reduce these contaminants

SUPERIOR WATER FILTRATION: PUR Basic pitcher water filters reduce Mercury, Copper and certain Pesticides and Industrial Pollutants, by using activated carbon & ion exchange. Using a PUR water filter for tap water is more affordable than bottled water.
TRY IT & SEE: Contaminants enter the water system daily, that's why filtering your water is important. We've been developing innovative technologies for superior water filtration for over 30 years.

specifications.Included Components: All Pur Pitchers And Filters Are Recyclable, Water Pitcher Filter Provides Up To 40 Gallons Of Clean Water, Pur 18 Cup Dispenser W/ 1 Filter, Bpa Free, 18 -Cup Displense, 1- Filter
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,852 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
